resources.string:
Github Devs helps you visualize developers in a locality, with a certain language, It's an app that was built for the android learning community initiated by Andela, it simply draws on an available list from Github api to populate it views.

 When a user is clicked on,Github Devs provides info about chosen github user, you can sort the list by number of repositories or followers too,

 You can also listen to github.audio from the app, Github.audio is a fun tool that plays music based on github events

 App Developer: Oloriade Taiye
